name: King Mystery -Hidden Objects
description:
Available as Universal app for iPhone, iPad, and iPod touch! -Hidden Objects Games.

>>> King Mystery -Hidden Objects

>>> Get Free Bonus Level.


>>> Try not to make mistakes; wrong click then Decrease your time.

>>> Time is also imported for high score.


How to play:-

-> you have to find out king Mystery room hidden object and other things in the unique and different backgrounds as early as possible within minimum time.

-> Hint option available for your help,but use it carefully it deducts your start.

-> Every level completed you got a coin! so play fair and fast to get 5 stars!

-> If you can share this app on facebook and Twitter then you will get some coin.

-> Game center leader boards to compete with friends & family!



Lets Download Free and Get it today For Fun!

if u like it! please rate it.
